featured.text: Your brain’s confused reaction makes you feel sick.
And if a flashlight fish is threatened by a predator, it swims away in a zigzag path, flashing its light on and off very quickly to confuse the animal pursuing it.
How did Deborah feel when she first hurt her knee? (A) Excited. (B) Confused. (C) Ashamed.

definition.en_def: To make someone unable to think clearly or understand something.
definition.example: The complicated instructions will confuse most people.
